name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: Fundamental concepts of computer science and programming

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: This course introduces the basics of artificial intelligence.

name: Programming Concepts
description: This subject provides a foundational understanding of the core principles and ideas that underpin all programming languages.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Advanced data structures and algorithmic techniques for efficient programming

name: Machine Learning
description: Fundamentals of machine learning algorithms and applications

name: Database Systems
description: Design and implementation of database management systems

name: Calculus II
description: Advanced calculus concepts including integration techniques and applications

name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Introduction to cybersecurity principles and practices

name: General Physics I
description: Mechanics, heat, and thermodynamics for science and engineering students

name: Web Development
description: Building modern web applications using current technologies

name: Calculus I
description: Introduction to limits, derivatives, and integrals.

name: Introduction to Literature
description: Analysis of major literary genres and critical approaches.

name: General Chemistry I
description: Fundamental principles of chemistry, including atomic structure and bonding.

name: World History
description: A survey of major global historical developments.

name: Operating Systems
description: Concepts of operating system design and implementation.

name: Linear Algebra
description: Vector spaces, linear transformations, matrices, and eigenvalues.
